subject: Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
Sports Injuries
Brain
Football
organizations: National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health
lead_paragraph: A doctor asked that a mention of chronic traumatic encephalopathy, or C.T.E., be removed from an advisory for players because it’s “not fully understood” and lacks “epidemiological validity.”
snippet: A doctor asked that a mention of chronic traumatic encephalopathy, or C.T.E., be removed from an advisory for players because it’s “not fully understood” and lacks “epidemiological validity.”
